name: just pain
description:
just pain is a short but very hard platformer game. It doesn't intend to be kind to the player, or allow mistakes. As the title says, it is just pain. Enjoy!

Controls: Use A and D to move. Press SPACE to jump. If you jump beside a wall you can jump up the wall.

Credit to Pixel Frog and SiLena_ART for the assets.

If you have any feedback please comment below.
